description: Borrowed from French mégalomanie; equivalent to megalo- +‎ -mania.

entries.meaning: A psychopathological condition characterized by delusional fantasies of wealth, power, or omnipotence.
examples: As to Ernest... He is quite as nervously broken down as I am but it manifests itself in different ways. His inclination is towards megalomania and mine towards melancholy.

entries.meaning: An obsession with grandiose or extravagant things or actions.
